architectural_notes: Email-sending functionality is currently disabled/unavailable (only supported for paid subscribers).

existing_features.title: Add a new Wallet route to the hash router and render a new Wallet page when the route is active.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add a button on the Dashboard that navigates to the Wallet page
On button click, send an email notification to payakash22@gmail.com

Update ONLY the selected button element (XPath: /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/section[7]/div[1]/div[2]/div[1]/div[2]/form[1]/button[1]) so the visible label reads exactly "Go to Wallet" (English) and clicking it navigates the user to the Wallet page/route.

projectName: Add Wallet navigation via selected button and create Wallet route/page
